name: Sutanu Gayen
content: Sutanu Gayen I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering in the Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur. Sutanu Gayen sutanu at cse.iitk.ac.in Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur Kadim Diwan Building 207 PO IIT Kanpur Kanpur, UP 208016 India Google Scholar Teaching Fall 2022 CSE798D: Algorithms for Bayesian Networks and Causality. Spring 2023 CSE 777: Topics in Learning Theory. Fall 2023 CSE 777: Topics in Learning Theory. Spring 2024 CSE 777: Topics in Learning Theory. Fall 2024 ESO 207: Data Structures and Algorithms. Spring 2025 CSE 777: Topics in Learning Theory. Research Interest My research interest broadly lies in theory and algorithms and specifically in the theory of machine learning. Plain Academic
